testcase.classname: user should be able to register to the E-commerce site
testcase.name: user could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to signup page..........................................passed When user enter valid data..................................................passed And user click create account button........................................passed Then user can create account successfully and go to homepage................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the E-commerce site
testcase.name: user could login with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed When user enter valid "victoria_victoria@nopCommerce.com" and valid "123456".passed And user click login button.................................................passed Then user can login successfully and go homepage............................passed

testcase.classname: User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.name: user could rest password with valid Email
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed When user click forget password button......................................passed And user enter valid Email and user click recover Button....................passed Then user recieve Instruction mail to rest password.........................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: user can search for products
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page and enter valid username and password.....passed When user search for product by "macbook"...................................passed And click search button.....................................................passed Then redirect to search page that contain "macbook".........................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.name: user can search for products 2
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page and enter valid username and password.....passed When user search for product by "laptop"....................................passed And click search button.....................................................passed Then redirect to search page that contain "laptop"..........................passed

testcase.name: user can search for products 3
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page and enter valid username and password.....passed When user search for product by "nike"......................................passed And click search button.....................................................passed Then redirect to search page that contain "nike"............................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: logged user can switch between currencies
testcase.system-out: Given user login with valid username and password...........................passed When user switch between currencies.........................................passed Then currency of product changed............................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.name: user could select different categories and sub categories
testcase.system-out: Given user open home page...................................................passed When user hover on category and user click on sub category..................passed Then user redirect to the page of selected sub-category.....................passed

testcase.name: logged user can Filter Color
testcase.system-out: Given user login with valid username and valid password Filter Color........passed When Type "Shoes" in search Box choose second product.......................passed And open product page adn choose any color..................................passed Then image of selected color is appear......................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could choose different tags
testcase.name: logged user can choose different tags
testcase.system-out: Given user login with valid username and valid password choose different tags.passed When press on any product from Home Page....................................passed And choose any tag..........................................................passed Then rdirect to page of products that have same choosen tag.................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could add different products to Shopping Cart
testcase.name: logged user can add products to Shopping Cart
testcase.system-out: Given user login with valid username and valid password to add to Shopping Cart.passed When press on add to cart Button on any product from Home Page..............passed Then product added to shopping cart.........................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.name: logged user can add products to whishList
testcase.system-out: Given user login with valid username and valid password.....................passed When press on wishList Button on any product from Home Page.................passed Then product added to whishList.............................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could add different products to compare List
testcase.name: logged user can add products to compare List
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page URL........................................passed When press on to compare List Button on any product from Home Page..........passed Then product added to Compare List..........................................passed

testcase.name: logged user can create order
testcase.system-out: Given user login with valid username and valid password and product add to Shopping Cart.passed When Open Shopping cart and check Term of Services.........................passed And Click checkout Button...................................................passed And choose address and Click Continue Button................................passed And Choose shipping method and Click Continue Button........................passed And Choose payment method and Click Continue Button.........................passed And check personal information and Click Continue Button....................passed And Click Confirm Button....................................................passed Then Order is processed successfully........................................passed
